text:
e="preserve">Bill Bowman (May 26, 1946 – August 15, 2020) was an American politician and businessman. He was a member of the North Dakota State Senate from 1990 until 2018. Bowman was born in Baker, Montana. He was a member of the Republican Party.
Bowman died on August 15, 2020 in Bowman, North Dakota at the age of 74.
